term.title: nuclear magneton

item.text: Electromagnetic fundamental physical constant µ N = m e m p µ B = 5.050 7866 1, where m e is the electron rest mass, m p the proton rest mass and µ B the Bohr magneton.

item.alttext: µ N = m e m p µ B = 5.050 7866 1
